[COUNTRY=India | CURRENCY=INR | REGULATOR=RBI | SOURCE=India_Stable_Assets__National Savings (Monthly Incom.md]
[TOPICS: eligibility, interest_rate, tenure]

| YEAR                                     | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                          |
|------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Category                                 | Provision / Rule                                                                                                              |
| Scheme Name                              | National Savings (Monthly Income Account) Scheme, 2019                                                                        |
| Legal Authority                          | Section 3A, Government Savings Promotion Act, 1873                                                                            |
| Notification                             | G.S.R. 917(E)                                                                                                                 |
| Commencement                             | Date of publication in the Official Gazette                                                                                   |
| Applicable Rules                         | Government Savings Promotion General Rules, 2018                                                                              |
| Definition of Year                       | Twelve months commencing from the date of deposit                                                                             |
| Eligible Account Holders                 | Single adult; up to three adults jointly; minor aged 10 years or above; guardian on behalf of minor or person of unsound mind |
| Number of Accounts Allowed               | One or more accounts permitted, singly or jointly, subject to overall deposit ceilings                                        |
| Joint Account Share for Ceiling          | Half share (two adults) or one-third share (three adults) considered for individual limit                                     |
| Deposit Type                             | Single lump-sum deposit only                                                                                                  |
| Minimum Deposit Amount                   | ₹1,000                                                                                                                        |

[COUNTRY=India | CURRENCY=INR | REGULATOR=RBI | SOURCE=India_Stable_Assets__National Savings (Monthly Incom.md]
[TOPICS: eligibility, interest_rate, tenure]

| YEAR                                     | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                          |
|------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Deposit Denomination                     | Multiples of ₹1,000                                                                                                           |
| Maximum Deposit – Single Account         | ₹9 lakh                                                                                                                       |
| Maximum Deposit – Joint Account          | ₹15 lakh                                                                                                                      |
| Overall Deposit Ceiling (All Accounts)   | ₹4.5 lakh (single accounts); ₹9 lakh (joint accounts) per individual                                                          |
| Interest Rate (12-12-2019 to 31-03-2020) | 7.6% per annum                                                                                                                |
| Interest Rate (on or after 01-04-2020)   | 6.6% per annum                                                                                                                |
| Interest Payment Frequency               | Monthly                                                                                                                       |
| Commencement of Interest                 | On completion of one month from date of deposit                                                                               |
| Interest on Unclaimed Interest           | No additional interest payable                                                                                                |
| Interest Rounding Rule                   | ≥50 paise rounded up; <50 paise ignored                                                                                       |
| Excess Deposit Handling                  | Excess amount refunded immediately                                                                                            |
| Interest on Excess Deposit               | Payable at Post Office Savings Account rate                                                                                   |

[COUNTRY=India | CURRENCY=INR | REGULATOR=RBI | SOURCE=India_Stable_Assets__National Savings (Monthly Incom.md]
[TOPICS: interest_rate, liquidity, tenure]

| YEAR                                     | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                          |
|------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Interest Period on Excess Deposit        | From date of deposit till end of month preceding refund                                                                       |
| Holiday Payment Rule                     | Monthly interest deemed payable on preceding working day                                                                      |
| Special Date Rule (29th–31st deposits)   | Interest paid on last day of following month or preceding working day                                                         |
| Premature Closure Allowed                | After completion of one year                                                                                                  |
| Penalty if Closed ≤3 Years               | 2% of deposit deducted                                                                                                        |
| Penalty if Closed >3 Years               | 1% of deposit deducted                                                                                                        |
| Normal Maturity Period                   | Five years                                                                                                                    |
| Payment on Maturity                      | Deposit plus accrued interest payable on application (Form-3)                                                                 |
| Death Before Maturity                    | Deposit refunded with interest up to preceding month                                                                          |
| Forms Used                               | Form-1 (opening), Form-2 (premature closure), Form-3 (maturity closure)                                                       |
| Application of General Rules             | Applicable where Scheme is silent                                                                                             |
| Power to Relax                           | Central Government may relax provisions to avoid hardship                                                                     |
